HeroArea.title: React and Next.js are my playground
HeroArea.description_1: I'm Agnieszka - a frontend developer and consultant who not only builds applications with React and Next.js, but also helps optimize, scale, and fix them. Hire me as your frontend consultant - let's take your project to the next level.
HeroArea.description_2: Struggling with performance issues? Legacy code? Need to migrate to Next.js? I'll jump in, audit the code, and deliver clear, effective solutions.
HeroArea.description_3: Hire me as your frontend consultant - let's take your project to the next level.

ContactPage.title: Let's Build Something Awesome Together
ContactPage.subtitle: Got a project in mind, need help with a website, or just want to say hi? Drop me a message — I'm always up for a creative challenge.

Footer.title: Seeking Opportunities
Footer.description: As a developer actively seeking new career opportunities, I am eager to contribute to exciting projects and advance my skills in a professional environment.
Footer.label_github: Explore my portfolio on GitHub for a deeper look at my projects:
Footer.label_email: Please feel free to reach out via email to discuss potential collaborations:
Footer.subtitle: I look forward to connecting with you!
